Name: Blade
Desc: A member of the Stellaron Hunters, and a swordsman who abandoned his body to become a blade.\nPledges loyalty to "Destiny's Slave," and possesses a terrifying self-healing ability.

1.Name: Blade Cuts the Deepest in Hell
1.Desc: Blade's Ultimate deals additionally increased DMG to a single enemy target, with the increased amount equal to <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> of the tally of Blade's HP loss in the current battle.\nThe tally of Blade's HP loss in the current battle is capped at <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak> of his Max HP. The tally value will be reset and re-accumulated after his Ultimate has been used.

2.Name: Ten Thousand Sorrows From One Broken Dream
2.Desc: When Blade is in the Hellscape state, his CRIT Rate increases by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>.

3.Name: Hardened Blade Bleeds Coldest Shade
3.Desc: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.\nTalent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.

4.Name: Rejected by Death, Infected With Life
4.Desc: When Blade's current HP percentage drops to <unbreak>50%</unbreak> or lower of his Max HP, increases his Max HP by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>. Stacks up to <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> time(s).

5.Name: Death By Ten Lords' Gaze
5.Desc: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.\nBasic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>10</unbreak>.

6.Name: Reborn Into an Empty Husk
6.Desc: The maximum number of Charge stacks is reduced to 4. The <u>Follow-up ATK</u> triggered by Talent deals additionally increased DMG equal to <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> of Blade's Max HP.

120501.Name: Shard Sword
120501.Desc: Deals <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Blade's ATK as Wind DMG to a target enemy.

120502.Name: Hellscape
120502.Desc:
Consumes HP equal to <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> of Blade's Max HP to enter the Hellscape state.
When Hellscape is active, his Skill cannot be used, his DMG dealt increases by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#4[i]%</unbreak></color>, and his Basic ATK Shard Sword is enhanced to Forest of Swords for <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> turn(s).
If Blade's current HP is insufficient, his HP will be reduced to 1 when he uses his Skill.
This Skill does not regenerate Energy. Using this Skill does not end the current turn.

120503.Name: Death Sentence
120503.Desc: Sets Blade's current HP to <unbreak>50%</unbreak> of his Max HP and deals Wind DMG to a single enemy equal to the sum of <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of his ATK, <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color> of his Max HP, and <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#5[i]%</unbreak></color> of the tally of Blade's HP loss in the current battle. At the same time, deals Wind DMG to adjacent targets equal to the sum of <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#3[f1]%</unbreak></color> of his ATK, <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#4[i]%</unbreak></color> of his Max HP, and <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#6[i]%</unbreak></color> of the tally of his HP loss in the current battle.\nThe tally of Blade's HP loss in the current battle is capped at <unbreak>#7[i]%</unbreak> of his Max HP. This value will be reset and re-accumulated after his Ultimate has been used.

120504.Name: Shuhu's Gift
120504.Desc: When Blade sustains DMG or consumes his HP, he gains 1 stack of Charge, stacking up to 5 times. A max of 1 Charge stack can be gained every time he is attacked.\nWhen Charge stack reaches maximum, immediately launches a <u>Follow-up ATK</u> on all enemies, dealing Wind DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color> of Blade's ATK plus <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#4[i]%</unbreak></color> of his Max HP. At the same time, restores Blade's HP by <unbreak>#3[i]%</unbreak> of his Max HP. After the Follow-up ATK, all Charges are consumed.

120506.Name: Attack
120506.Desc: Attacks an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduces their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

120507.Name: Karma Wind
120507.Desc: Immediately attacks the enemy. After entering combat, consumes <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak> of Blade's Max HP while dealing Wind DMG equal to <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> of his Max HP to all enemies.\nIf Blade's current HP is insufficient, his HP will be reduced to 1 when this Technique is used.

120508.Name: Forest of Swords
120508.Desc: Consumes HP equal to <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> of Blade's Max HP and deals Wind DMG equal to the sum of <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color> of his ATK and <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#4[i]%</unbreak></color> of his Max HP to a single enemy. In addition, deals Wind DMG equal to the sum of <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#3[i]%</unbreak></color> of Blade's ATK and <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#5[i]%</unbreak></color> of his Max HP to adjacent targets.\nIf Blade's current HP is insufficient, his HP will be reduced to 1 when using Forest of Swords.\nForest of Swords cannot regenerate Skill Points.

1.PointDesc: When Blade's current HP percentage is at <unbreak>50%</unbreak> of Max HP or lower, the HP restored when receiving healing increases by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>.
If Blade hits a <u>Weakness Broken</u> enemy after using "Forest of Swords," he will restore HP equal to <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> of his Max HP plus <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak>.
Increases DMG dealt by the Talent's <u>Follow-up ATK</u> by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>.

1.Name: Blade Cuts the Deepest in Hell
1.Desc: Blade's Enhanced Basic ATK and Ultimate deals additionally increased DMG to one designated enemy, with the increased amount equal to <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> of the tally of Blade's HP loss in the current battle.\nThe tally of Blade's HP loss in the current battle is capped at <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak> of his Max HP. The tally value will be reset and re-accumulated after his Ultimate has been used.

2.Name: Ten Thousand Sorrows From One Broken Dream
2.Desc: When Blade is in the "Hellscape" state, his CRIT Rate increases by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>.

3.Name: Hardened Blade Bleeds Coldest Shade
3.Desc: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.\nTalent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.

4.Name: Rejected by Death, Infected With Life
4.Desc: When Blade's current HP percentage drops from above <unbreak>50%</unbreak> to <unbreak>50%</unbreak> of his Max HP or lower, increases his Max HP by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>. Stacks up to <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> time(s).

5.Name: Death By Ten Lords' Gaze
5.Desc: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.\nBasic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>10</unbreak>.

6.Name: Reborn Into an Empty Husk
6.Desc: The maximum number of Charge stacks is reduced to 4. The <u>Follow-up ATK</u> triggered by Talent deals additionally increased DMG equal to <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> of Blade's Max HP.

1120501.Name: Shard Sword
1120501.Desc: Deals Wind DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Blade's Max HP to one designated enemy.

1120502.Name: Hellscape
1120502.Desc:
Consumes HP equal to <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> of Blade's Max HP to enter the "Hellscape" state.
While under the "Hellscape" state, his Skill cannot be used, his DMG dealt increases by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#4[i]%</unbreak></color>, the chance of receiving attacks from enemy targets greatly increases, and his Basic ATK "Shard Sword" is enhanced to "Forest of Swords" for <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> turn(s).
If Blade's current HP is insufficient, his HP will be reduced to 1 when he uses his Skill.
This Skill does not regenerate Energy. Using this Skill does not end the current turn.

1120503.Name: Death Sentence
1120503.Desc: Sets Blade's current HP to <unbreak>50%</unbreak> of his Max HP and deals Wind DMG to one designated enemy equal to the sum of <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of his Max HP and <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#5[i]%</unbreak></color> of the tally of Blade's HP loss in the current battle. At the same time, deals Wind DMG to adjacent targets equal to the sum of <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#3[f1]%</unbreak></color> of his Max HP and <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#6[i]%</unbreak></color> of the tally of his HP loss in the current battle.\nThe tally of Blade's HP loss in the current battle is capped at <unbreak>#7[i]%</unbreak> of his Max HP. This value will be reset and re-accumulated after his Ultimate has been used.

1120504.Name: Shuhu's Gift
1120504.Desc: When Blade sustains DMG or consumes his HP, he gains 1 stack of Charge, stacking up to 5 times. A max of 1 Charge stack can be gained every time he is attacked.\nWhen Charge stack reaches maximum, immediately launches 1 <u>Follow-up ATK</u> on all enemies, dealing Wind DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color> of Blade's Max HP. At the same time, restores Blade's HP by <unbreak>#3[i]%</unbreak> of his Max HP. After the Follow-up ATK, all Charges are consumed.

1120506.Name: Attack
1120506.Desc: Attacks an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduces their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

1120507.Name: Karma Wind
1120507.Desc: Immediately attacks the enemy. After entering combat, consumes <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak> of Blade's Max HP while dealing Wind DMG equal to <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> of his Max HP to all enemies.\nIf Blade's current HP is insufficient, his HP will be reduced to 1 when this Technique is used.

1120508.Name: Forest of Swords
1120508.Desc: Consumes HP equal to <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> of Blade's Max HP and deals Wind DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color> of his Max HP to one designated enemy. In addition, deals Wind DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#3[i]%</unbreak></color> of Blade's Max HP to adjacent targets.\nIf Blade's current HP is insufficient, his HP will be reduced to 1 when using "Forest of Swords."\n"Forest of Swords" cannot regenerate Skill Points.

1.PointDesc: When Blade's current HP percentage is at <unbreak>50%</unbreak> of Max HP or lower, the HP restored when receiving healing increases by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>.
If Blade hits a <u>Weakness Broken</u> enemy target after using "Forest of Swords," he will restore HP equal to <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> of his Max HP plus <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak>.
Increases DMG dealt by the Talent's <u>Follow-up ATK</u> by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>. Additionally regenerates <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> Energy.
